short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZAuth empowers developers to allow users to bring their Identity & Activity on Internet via ZkProofs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ZAuth serves as an alternative to OAuth2, allowing websites to authenticate users' identities and activities through zkproofs powered by Reclaim Protocol.

Key Value Propositions

* Enable users to store & use zkproofs offline or over the secure cloud (powered by zauth)
* Enable websites to access zkproofs upon user authorization over ZAuth context (injected onto DOM on pageload)
* Enables users to generate zkproofs of their identity (& activity on various webapps )over the browser  [Experimental]
* Enable users to CRUD zkproofs along with label & date.
